title: It's Ok Mom; Just Take Deep Breaths
description: It's OK Mom; Just Take Deep Breaths is a humor memoir of a mom/college professor. It takes a comical look at the funny and the not-so-funny aspects of working life and raising kids. The book is comprised of a series of laughable vignettes with the overall message that humor is the best way of dealing with the ups and downs of very relatable situations that most parents and employees have experienced.
author: Jill Keller
